meanings.definition: To disturb the condition, action, or function of.
meanings.sent1: The loud noise deranged his concentration during the test.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected news deranged their plans for the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy deranged the carefully arranged flowers.
meanings.sent4: The storm deranged the peaceful atmosphere of the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The virus deranged the normal functioning of the computer system.
